subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [SDWR-SpeakingToTheDeadWithRadios-] Here's a cool 	one, stat...
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I joined that group, but I don't see that the guy is doing anything
different than every other self proclaimed world's onlyest box---swept radio
method--expert is doing. So what if one calls it some other name, it's still
using the same equipment, and doing the same presumptuous stuff. At the risk
of being negative too soon.

 Swept radio is more accurate than "box".

 BTW, probably not polite, or kosher to cross post between groups

 F-S
